players.name: Alice
memory:
Diana: "I am the detective and I found out Alice is mafia.
"
You: "I am not the mafia, I was framed by Diana. She is the real mafia."
Bob: "I am a villager and I believe Diana is the mafia based on her accusation against Alice. However, I will continue to investigate and gather more information."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
